text: Mýa is the self-titled debut studio album by American recording artist Mýa. It was her first studio album for then-record label Interscope Records released April 21, 1998. When the album was released Mýa was a teenager. ==Reviews== Mýa received mixed reviews when it was released. ==Track listing== ==Charts and certifications== ===Weekly charts=== Chart (1998) Peak position ===Year-end charts=== Year Chart Rank 1998 Billboard 200 87 Top R&B;/Hip-Hop Albums 43 1999 Billboard 200 200 ===Certifications=== ==References== Category:1998 albums Category:Debut albums Category:Hip hop soul albums Category:R&B; albums Category:Mýa albums Category:Interscope Records albums
title: Mýa (album)
